title: 470-E
statement: E. Chessboardtime limit per test2 secondsmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstdinoutputstdoutChessboard is a board ofn×nsquares arranged in two alternating colors (black and white). Top left square is white. You are given board sizen. Output an image of a chessboard, with black and white squares marked with '#' and '.' characters, respectively.InputThe only line of input contains an integern(1 ≤n≤ 9).OutputOutput an image ofn×nchessboard.ExamplesInput4Output.#.##.#..#.##.#.
